price: Amma waɗan da suka yi arziki to, sunã a cikin Aljanna sunã madawwama, a cikinta, matuƙar sammai da ƙasa sun dawwama, fãce abin da Ubangijinka Ya so. Kyauta wadda bã ta yankẽwa.
arabic: ۞ وَأَمَّا ٱلَّذِينَ سُعِدُواْ فَفِي ٱلۡجَنَّةِ خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَا مَا دَامَتِ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتُ وَٱلۡأَرۡضُ إِلَّا مَا شَآءَ رَبُّكَۖ عَطَآءً غَيۡرَ مَجۡذُوذٖ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-ammā alladhīna suʿidū fafī al-janati khālidīna fīhā mā dāmati al-samāwātu wal-arḍu illā mā shāa rabbuka ʿaṭāan ghayra majdhūdhin
